text: Fedor Wilhelm Weinschenk (4 January 1916 - 22 June 1942) was a Polish alpine skier. He competed in the men's combined event at the 1936 Winter Olympics. Weinschenk was of German ethnicity, competing for the local German Bielsko skiing club. During World War II, he was drafted to Wehrmacht and fought on the Eastern Front, where he was declared as missing on 22 June 1942. This was confirmed also by his family after the war.Profile at the website of Polish Olympic Committee ==References== Category:1916 births Category:1942 deaths Category:Polish male alpine skiers Category:Olympic alpine skiers of Poland Category:Alpine skiers at the 1936 Winter Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Bielsko-Biała Category:Polish people of German descent Category:German military personnel of World War II
title: Fedor Weinschenk
